name: Spell Caster Lite
description:
Spell Caster is a platformer game where you play as a wizard who has access to spells to aid him on his journeys. 

The wizard's spells include:

  • Fireball Spell (Shoots fireballs while held down)
  • Acrobat Spell (Increases jump/move speed)
  • Shield Spell (Protects from damage)
  • Heal Spell (Heals you)

As you collect more mana, you can upgrade each of your spells to make them better. 

In this free version, the first of the five worlds is available to play. Features that will are coming in the full version include:

  • Cosmetic items to customize the appearance of the wizard and his spells
  • 4 more worlds worth of levels,
  • A secret second ending
  • Much more
